Name: Stephanie Hernandez
Description:
Stephanie was murdered by Kelly Nichols, who had earlier picked her up in a taxi.

> POLICE REQUEST: San Francisco police are appealing for a cab driver to assist them in their investigation of a murder.
>
> Homicide Inspector Michael Byrne is looking for a cabbie who on Thursday morning reportedly took Kelly Nichols, 31, first to the 1900 block of Broadway, then to Polk and O'Farrell streets, where Nichols picked up [deadname] Hernandez, 23, a [trans woman] also known as Stephanie.
>
> Hernandez was found later that same day in Nichols' Naylor Street home, beaten and stabbed to death.
>
> Nichols is currently in custody on homicide charges. Police are seeking the cabdriver, believed to work for Luxor, to aid them in completing their investigation.
